home.subtitle: Artisan Bakery
home.description: , where every dessert is a work of art created with love and the freshest ingredients. Our artisanal cakes are handmade with traditional techniques and a modern touch.
home.descriptionSecondary: Discover our selection of cakes, cupcakes, cookies and more delights that will sweeten your special moments.
home.constructionDescription: We are working to bring you the best experience. In the meantime, explore our complete catalog of artisanal products.

catalog.title: Our Catalog
catalog.description: Discover our complete selection of artisanal desserts. Each product is made with fresh ingredients and lots of love.

step4.title: Pick it up at our store
step4.description: Come get your order when it's ready

philosophy.title: Behind every cake
philosophy.mainDescription:
We want to create a unique, special and delicious cake for you.

Each of our sweets is made in a completely artisanal way, prioritizing the best quality ingredients and respecting the time that each process needs to achieve a perfect result.
philosophy.collaborationTitle: To achieve this, we need your collaboration:

anticipation.title: Advance Notice
anticipation.description:
Place your order with at least 48 hours advance notice.
This allows us to plan and dedicate the time that each creation deserves.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description:
Tell us your tastes and preferences when placing the order.
This way we avoid flavors you don't like and take care of any allergies or dietary restrictions to prevent cross-contamination.

inspiration.title: Inspiration
inspiration.description: You can send us references or inspiration images (for example, from Pinterest or other colleagues), but we don't make exact replicas: we like to design something truly unique for you.

decorations.title: Decorations
decorations.description: Our coverings and decorations are made mainly with vanilla buttercream. If you prefer, we can also make them with white or dark chocolate ganache. Please note that some decorations or prices may vary.

closing.message: Thank you for trusting our creativity to create something that not only looks incredible, but is also memorable from the first bite.

footer.brandDescription: Artisanal bakery where every dessert is a work of art created with love and high-quality ingredients.
